edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.otBatch

Class OTBatchOnByteArraySInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.otBatch.OTBatchOnByteArraySInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OTBatchSInput

    public class OTBatchOnByteArraySInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements OTBatchSInput
    Concrete implementation of batch OT sender (on byteArray) input.

    In the byteArray scenario, the sender gets for each i=1,...,m, two binary strings x0, x1 of the same (arbitrary) length.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OTBatchOnByteArraySInput(java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> x0Arr, java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> x1Arr)
      Sets the input for the Batch OT, in case the OT is working on byte[].

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> getX0Arr()
      Returns x0 array, contains all xi0 values of the tuples (xi0, xi1).
      java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> getX1Arr()
      Returns x1 array, contains all xi1 values of the tuples (xi0, xi1).
